member.name: T:PerAspera.GameAPI.Native.ModEventBus
member.summary: ModEventBus - Proxy for event publishing from native event patches GameAPI doesn't depend on ModSDK, so this provides a callback-based system ModSDK will hook into these callbacks to integrate with its EventSystem

member.summary: Publish an event - called by NativeEventPatcher patches ModSDK will hook this to forward to its EventSystem
